thread.section_title: L & M Carpet One Floor & Home Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of L & M Carpet One Floor & Home | www.landmcarpetonemechanicsville.com
thread.title: William & Kathleen Sanderlin
thread.title_full: L & M Carpet One Floor & Home reviewed by William & Kathleen Sanderlin

author: William & Kathleen Sanderlin
title: William & Kathleen Sanderlin
text:
The work was done in a timely manner and was done professionally.
This was not the first time we had used L & M Carpet One. They have
installed carpet, vinyl flooring, ceramic floor and now Armstrong's new Alterna engineered stone flooring in our kitchen. We are very pleased.
L & M Carpet One will back up their work. That is very important.
